title: Add visual preview for both SVG input and converted clip-path output

requirements.text: Add an SVG *input preview* that renders the user-provided SVG path (`d` attribute) so users can visually verify the input shape.

quotes: Same i need with preview option for both input and output

acceptanceCriteria: When the user pastes an SVG path or uploads an SVG file, the app shows a visual preview of the input path rendered inside an <svg> element.
The input preview updates live as the input changes.
If the input is empty or invalid, the input preview area shows an empty/placeholder state instead of throwing errors.

requirements.text: Update the existing preview UI to support previewing *both* the input shape and the output clip-path result (e.g., via top-level tabs/segmented control: “Input Preview” and “Output Preview”).

quotes: Same i need with preview option for both input and output

acceptanceCriteria: The preview card provides a clear control to switch between “Input Preview” and “Output Preview”.
“Output Preview” continues to support switching between path() and polygon() formats as it does today.
Switching preview modes does not affect the generated output values shown in the Output section.

requirements.text: Plumb the raw SVG path string from `ConverterSection` into the preview component so the preview can render the input SVG path (update `PreviewSection` props accordingly).

quotes: Same i need with preview option for both input and output

acceptanceCriteria: `ConverterSection` passes the current `svgPath` state down to `PreviewSection`.
`PreviewSection` accepts the new prop and uses it only for the input preview rendering.
TypeScript types compile with no errors after prop changes.

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend immutable paths (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`).
Keep the backend as-is; no Motoko/backend changes are required for previews.
nonGoals: Do not add new conversion algorithms beyond the existing path() and polygon() conversions.
Do not add third-party rendering libraries; use standard React + SVG/HTML preview rendering.
Do not change authentication/Internet Identity behavior.
